states.name: Andhra Pradesh
states.history: Andhra Pradesh was formed on November 1, 1956, as the first state in India to be formed on a linguistic basis. It was later bifurcated into two states - Andhra Pradesh and Telangana on June 2, 2014.

states.name: Arunachal Pradesh
states.history: Arunachal Pradesh became a full-fledged state of India on February 20, 1987. It was earlier known as the North-East Frontier Agency (NEFA).

states.name: Assam
states.history: Assam was one of the original states of India, formed on April 1, 1937. It is known for its rich biodiversity and tea production.

states.name: Bihar
states.history: Bihar, one of the oldest inhabited places in the world, became a state of India on November 15, 2000, after the bifurcation of the state of Bihar and Jharkhand.

states.name: Chhattisgarh
states.history: Chhattisgarh was carved out of Madhya Pradesh on November 1, 2000, as the 26th state of India. It is known for its abundant mineral resources.

states.name: Goa
states.history: Goa, known for its beautiful beaches and Portuguese influence, became the 25th state of India on May 30, 1987.

states.name: Gujarat
states.history: Gujarat, the land of Mahatma Gandhi, was formed on May 1, 1960, after the reorganization of the state of Bombay.

states.name: Haryana
states.history: Haryana was carved out of the state of Punjab on November 1, 1966. It is one of the wealthiest states in India.

states.name: Himachal Pradesh
states.history: Himachal Pradesh became a state of India on January 25, 1971, after being carved out of the state of Punjab. It is known for its picturesque landscapes.

states.name: Jharkhand
states.history: Jharkhand was carved out of the state of Bihar on November 15, 2000, as the 28th state of India. It is rich in mineral resources.

states.name: Karnataka
states.history: Karnataka, earlier known as Mysore, was formed on November 1, 1956, after the reorganization of states based on language.

states.name: Kerala
states.history: Kerala, known for its unique culture and high literacy rate, was formed on November 1, 1956.

states.name: Madhya Pradesh
states.history: Madhya Pradesh, located in the central part of India, was formed on November 1, 1956.

states.name: Maharashtra
states.history: Maharashtra, the second-most populous state in India, was formed on May 1, 1960, after the reorganization of states based on language.

states.name: Manipur
states.history: Manipur became a full-fledged state of India on January 21, 1972. It is known for its rich cultural heritage.

states.name: Meghalaya
states.history: Meghalaya, known for its scenic beauty and abundant rainfall, became a state of India on January 21, 1972.

states.name: Mizoram
states.history: Mizoram, earlier known as the Lushai Hills District of Assam, became a full-fledged state of India on February 20, 1987.

states.name: Nagaland
states.history: Nagaland became the 16th state of India on December 1, 1963. It is known for its distinct tribal cultures.

states.name: Odisha
states.history: Odisha, earlier known as Orissa, was formed on April 1, 1936. It has a rich history and cultural heritage.

states.name: Punjab
states.history: Punjab, known for its fertile land and vibrant culture, was formed on November 1, 1966, after the reorganization of states based on language.

states.name: Rajasthan
states.history: Rajasthan, the land of the kings, was formed on November 1, 1956. It is known for its historical forts and palaces.

states.name: Sikkim
states.history: Sikkim became the 22nd state of India on May 16, 1975. It is known for its picturesque landscapes and Buddhist culture.

states.name: Tamil Nadu
states.history: Tamil Nadu, earlier known as Madras, was formed on November 1, 1956, as the first state to be formed on a linguistic basis.

states.name: Telangana
states.history: Telangana became the 29th state of India on June 2, 2014, after the bifurcation of Andhra Pradesh. It was the first state to be formed after the new reorganization of states.

states.name: Tripura
states.history: Tripura became a full-fledged state of India on January 21, 1972. It is known for its rich biodiversity and tribal cultures.

states.name: Uttar Pradesh
states.history: Uttar Pradesh, the most populous state in India, was formed on January 26, 1950, after the adoption of the Indian Constitution.

states.name: Uttarakhand
states.history: Uttarakhand, known for its scenic beauty and religious significance, became the 27th state of India on November 9, 2000.

states.name: West Bengal
states.history: West Bengal, known for its cultural diversity and intellectual heritage, was formed on January 26, 1950.
